author: {'steamid': '76561198273669617', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 3254, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1306, 'last_played': 1693572710}
review:
Absolute classic this game. Sure it has its bugs and there isnt much balancing in the strenght of different playable factions, but theres so much this game does do right and so early that you cant help but have fun with it.
The story is also a bit meh, where this game shines in my opinion is the progression of your hero character coupled with your Generals. This adds a lot to the game since there are a sh*t ton of factions and even more so classes your hero can be. There are many hours of experimentation to be had finding out what is the most optimal build or the most powerful spells to learn for your hero.
Would recommend to anyone who is into RTSs with a heavy reliance on a main Hero character to lead the army. Imagine Warcraft 3 but with more insanity and options for character involvement/development.

review: Моя оценка относится только к этому источнику, сама игра от разработчиков очень хорошая! Мне хватило проверить за нежить некромансером и за демонов саммонером чтобы определить разницу. В оригинальной игре у призываемых существ срок службы не ограничен таймером, а также размер Retinee определяется харизмой главного героя и для некромансера из нежити около 2 а не максимальный как здесь. Налицо грубое нарушение баланса игры , сделанной разработчиками. Может, кому-то перекошенный баланс и понравится.

author: {'steamid': '76561198078638401', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 9874, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7264, 'last_played': 1690739974}
review: Mai szemmel elavult és csúnyának számít, de szerintem minden idők legjobb RPG-RTS keveréke és azóta sem sikerült felülmúlnia másik játéknak a kategóriában. Sajnos steamen az unofficial patchel kerül telepítésre ami, nem éppen a legjobb oldalát mutatja a játéknak, de régebbi verzióra vissza lehet frissíteni és a patchelt verziónak(Time Magic, Summoning Nerf) is meg van a saját varázsa. Érdemes mindkét verziót kipróbálni, de WBC 1-2-3 eredeti játékmenete sokkal élvezetesebb szerintem. WBC3 azon kevés játékok közé tartozik, ami nem 3-4 fajra és egy kicsit több kasztra korlátozza a karakterek személyre szabhatóságát. Több mint 15 faj tetszés szerint kombinálható több mint 25 klasszal, ami régi és mai mércével is kiemelkedően magas kombinációt ajánl azoknak akik szeretik saját ízlésükhöz igazítani játék stílusukat. Sajnos ez azzal jár együtt, hogy faj/klassz kombinációk nincsenek egyensúlyban, ami a PvP részénél, de sokszor gyengébb kombinációt választva PvE-ben is könnyedén hátrányos helyzetbe hozhat, bár annak is meg van a saját varázsa, amit egy kiegyensúlyozott játék nem tud nyújtani. Csatlósok átvitele egyik játékmenetből a másikba, valamint egységek szintlépése jelen van, amit sokan megszeretek Homeworld és RedAlert2 játékokban. Idejében egyedi volt és manapság is ritkaság számba megy az M.I. funkciók variációja, amivel az egységeknek megmondhatjuk, hogyan viselkedjenek a különböző esetekben, mit csináljanak alapértelmezett esetben(Egy pár példa: Állj egy helyben(Melee range defense), védd a területet, Ellenség felfedezése esetén üldözd, Search and Destroy, Fedezz fel, Varázslattal védj, üldöz, Pusztíts, Ellenséges erők esetén menekülj, illetve régebben volt több M.I. viselkedési mod is(védekezz és idéz szörnyeket opciót is lehetett választani) ezeket nem csak egységre, csoportra, de épületre is be lehetett állítani). Habár formációkat is kezel WBC3 ezen a területen sajnos eléggé gyenge. Korában az elsők között volt például ahol ismétlődő gyártási sor volt elérhető, Ami manapság szinte már alap RTS-eknél. Játékban RPG elemekhez hasonlóan, tárgyakat vehetünk, Mini küldetéseket csinálhatunk. Kampány történetmenete sem rossz. Míg az első rész egy történetszálra koncentrált, addig a második rész területfoglalásra, a harmadik rész pedig kalandozásra invitál. A retro játékok szerelmeseinek mindenféleképpen ajánlom. Korának egyik rejtett gyöngye a Warlords Battlecry sorozat, így a harmadik rész is.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971745805', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 177, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 138, 'last_played': 1574977100}
review: This port has some technical issues (resolution wise etc) and it is not as fun as I expected actually. I bought it cause the gameplay looked interesting with vast number of races and the graphics reminded me of other old fantasy games. So I thought it would be up my alley, but when you play it (and have no nostalgic feelings to it) the game is just feels very mediocre. The interface & controls are really bad when compared to other rts games (especially compared to something like Age of Mythology) but even older games like Seven Kingdoms 2 have better ui and play better. Disappointed cause I do like the idea of the hero system etc. I will give the game a few more tries and see if my opinion changes, perhaps it needs to grow on me. In the meantime I can recommend Spellforce 1 if people want to try an unique mix of rpg and rts with lots of fantasy races thrown in.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053220374', 'num_games_owned': 137, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 5418, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2294, 'last_played': 1708777510}
review:
Warlords Battlecry 3 is one of the nicest games I have ever played.
Admittedly, the graphics are dated, but the game is 15 years old (made in 2004, I made the review in 2019), so you can get past that. Even with the dated graphics, the environments still look nice.
As for the gameplay, while it keeps the standard RTS style, it gives you a lot of options when it comes to playing. You have 16 nations, ranging from the standard Men, Orcs and Elves to more obscure, like the Swarm, which is literally a bug nation and my personal favorite: the Ssrathi,which have lizardmen as the standard infantry and dinosaurs for cavalry. And while there are shared units the nations are quite different.
Another nice thing is that you can build your own hero. You put the name, a race, a class and if you want a bit more to customize, you can change your hero's avatar, model and voice (each of those are specific per race, but it is still a cool thing). Just be sure you won't put it in Iron Man Mode, unless you have grown used to playing, since if you hero dies you have to delete him/her as you can't use him/her again. The interesting thing is that the same class has differences among the races in both stats and skills.
The campaign is actually a grand adventure where your hero travels across the world, something I haven't seen in a strategy game yet and I enjoy very much.


TL;DR: I believe it's a nice but a little old fantasy RTS game that you should get if you like games like this. To give a clearer rate, I will give it a 9/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197995423810', 'num_games_owned': 902, 'num_reviews': 141, 'playtime_forever': 1526, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1510, 'last_played': 1651617728}
review:
Warlords Battlecry справедливо забытая серия стратегия начала нулевых. На этом можно закончить, но приятные ностальгические воспоминания о том как я играл в пиратскую версию третей части в далеком детстве толкает меня на этот очерк. 

Главная фишка этой игры - полная дизбалансность. 
Игра - яркий пример того, что много фракций и возможностей очень сложно, почти нереально, сбалансировать в здоровую игровую систему. Игра предлагает на выбор 16 типичных фентази фракций. Рыцари, дворфы, жуканы, чумоходы, нежить, минотавры, россыпь эльфов и ведерко зеленокожих - все тут есть. К этому приделано больше 20 классов для героя, тут тоже полный зоопарк, как факультетов в провинциальном ВУЗе. Выбирай специализацию война, до некроманта, через призывателя и алхимика. Такого по сей день нигде не встретите.

Сколько из всего этого спектра возможностей весело и работает? Дай бог треть просто играбельные, и еще меньше по-настоящему крутые и мощные сборки. Игра одновременно предлагает широкий выбор ассетов и уникальных моделек для каждой расы, но дублирует одинаковые механики для всех из них. Игра обладает очень низким темпом, ресурсов дают мало, домики строятся долго, солдатики неохотно вылазиют из своих бараков, а затем лениво бегут до врага. 

Но это совершенно не нужно, так как герой на световой скорости уже пробежал карту и убил всех врагов, забрах их артефакты и надругался на святынями. Eсли конечно вы заранее интересовались, что тут имба и не стали делать магов. 

Что тут хорошо? Чудом сохранившаяся спрайтовая графика, невероятная пастораль повсюду. Боевитая фентази музыка. Сюжет про побег демонов из курятника, некоторые сайд квесты. 

Warlords - это прекрасная иллюстрация, что игры далеко шагнули вперед. В плане геймдизайна, баланса и прочих квалити оф лайф штуках. Все вокруг почему-то помнят только выдающиеся шедевры, но таких игр как Battlecry 3 было тоже много и в среднем они проигрывают любому инди поделию со дна Стима.

author: {'steamid': '76561198429132794', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 3351, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3351, 'last_played': 1513232136}
review:
I don't like RTS games.  I have tried/played many of them, and simply put, RTS games are not "my cup of tea".  It's not that I do badly at them, in fact, I typically do fairly well at them, .... I just enjoy other game types more.  That having been said, I have always loved WBCIII.  I cannot put my finger on it, exactly, but WBCIII has drawn me back again and again, to "play just a little bit more", "make a little more progress" with that character or that one.

The character classes, races, and stats system, along with the leveling system are all [b]*_VERY_*[/b] well done.  Each race has their particular strengths (and weaknesses, too!) and you should learn the racial benefits & drawbacks well, and play to those strengths, while mitigating/covering your weaknesses, as best as possible.  This is where your hero can provide a great deal of benefit, with your class indicating your best available options.  Your hero is one of the few units who can 'convert' or capture mines and buildings.  While not delicate, heroes CAN be overwhelmed and taken down, especially if you find yourself in range of a couple of towers... and losing your hero makes completing the mission incredibly more difficult, if not impossible.

The campaign is fairly long and well-done and offers several different paths to complete the main quest.  The graphics are very good; as is unit design and the class build tree design, and sound design.  Unit AI seems to perform remarkably well, particularly if you take the time to set the unit attitude correctly to the task you want it to perform.  All-in-all, a very good RTS game with a beautiful and strong touch of RPG/fantasy elements to really make it shine!!  A _GREAT_ game to add to your library, especially if you can get it on sale!

author: {'steamid': '76561198145284866', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 3942, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1345, 'last_played': 1691710137}
review:
This game is a great game if you don't mind playing a hero that can never max out level and most of the fun of it is learning how to cheese the game. I can easily make a merchant character and flood the battlefield with pikemen before a necromancer can summon a champion. I run a merchant character that can get a palace up followed by three peasants that can get three barracks up immediately after. Once its up and going producing three pike men a minute. My discounts are kind of insane right now at a 50% discount and I want to see if there is a point at which I can reach zero or near zero.

This is a good game that deserves better than what it's gotten in the last couple of years and I would love to see a remaster of it with better graphics without changing the game play. 

Needs better multiplayer functionality, more items to support different kinds of play style would be extremely helpful as certain classes are not classes that anyone would pick since outside of leveling up the character there is nothing to make those classes stand out as "fun" or exciting.

The summoning timer needs removed from summoned units on the grounds that the game is easily broken in the first place and all that does is make the game harder for certain classes as yes they can near instantly summon a army. I can also easily build an army just as fast by spamming units into production. 

Would love that message that shows up when a enemy unit starts converting your buildings not removed but changed.

I do recommend this game, and would love to see some real updates to it or a eventual remaster that expands on the lore, items, and heroes without removing their ability to infinitely level up. That isn't going to happen however it is a nice thought.

author: {'steamid': '76561198169417853', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 4029, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 344, 'last_played': 1681643999}
review: Heavily recommended for fans of RTS, this game is the most "RPG" that the RTS genre has ever had. 16 races & 28 classes to customize your hero, with items, quests, and a big number of different spellbooks and spells, all complementing a solid (if somewhat unbalanced) RTS base-builder where each race is distinct and flavorful. I was afraid this game wouldn't run on Windows 10 but it does, and pretty smoothly at that. The only problem you may have with the game is that it looks pretty dated graphics-wise, considering that it's a contemporary of games like Age of Mythology, Rise of Nations and Warcraft 3 (and came out -after- those games!) and yet it looks like it came out 4 years prior.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037455911', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 11710, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 11, 'playtime_at_review': 8307, 'last_played': 1712183543}
review:
Several years ago my uncle went to a garage sale and picked up this game for me for the low sum of $5. 3,000 hours on the disk version and now over 100 hours on the steam version I cannot emphasize enough how much value you get out of the game. I was truly excited to see that Warlords Battlecry III came to steam although some of the balance changes are undesired they tend to make the game better overall unless your trying to play a necromancer or as the demon faction, since both of these suffer from summoned units despawning after a timer which is by no means off set by the fact they no longer use population. Besides bringing back the old summoning system there really isn't anything I would change about this game. Hope this review inspires atleast one person to check this game out, you surely won't regret it. I hope one day we will get a Warlords Battlecry IV but given the age of this game I doubt such a glorious day will ever occur. Now if you will exccuse me, I need to recruit hordes of mercenaries and exterminate the snakemen, and perhaps just a little burning down the world with my pyromancer/alchemist minotaur hero. 

p.s. several factions and even more hero options means replayablity is not something you will worry about as there is 100,000s of combinations, maybe not that many but its alot, even with all my time in the game i have really only played 2 of those options out sufficently to become a pro at them.

author: {'steamid': '76561198823818936', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 16379, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13165, 'last_played': 1631938325}
review: Excelente jogo de estratégia,diversas raças e classes, campanha não muito extensa.Pontos negativos o modo multiplayer só da para jogar via tcp/ip,lan, não tem servidores ativos, um bug especifico que permite o jogador duplicar items facilmente,em uma partida tcp/ip, com um amigo você dropa o item para ele, depois sai da partida e entra em uma partida offline e o item reaparece no inventário, isso tira toda a graça do jogo deixando fácil e tosco, fora que o mais chato é que os desenvolvedores do jogo não oferecerão aos usuários a possibilidade de salvar o progresso na nuvem, sendo que é um jogo antigo, o arquivo contendo o progresso do jogador deve pesar menos de 10mb, ou seja se tiver algum problema no pc e tiver que formatar vai ter que começar do zero.

review:
Un des meilleurs jeux auxquels j'ai joué. La saga des Warlords Battlecry est vraiment génial. Très grande variété de peuple et d'unités. Un héros qui acquiert de l'expérience et évolue au fur et à mesure des batailles. 
Le scénario du 3 n'est pas à la hauteur du premier épisode mais reste très intéressant.
Dommage que les précédent opus ne soient pas sur Steam.

author: {'steamid': '76561198096524393', 'num_games_owned': 827, 'num_reviews': 156, 'playtime_forever': 786, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 719, 'last_played': 1687696900}
review:
Świetny RTS, z kampanią, która pozwala na sporą dowolność rozgrywki, zachowując przy tym spójną, i w pewnym sensie mocno nieliniową kampanię.

+ System bohatera; mnóstwo ras i klas do wyboru, każda kombinacja jest na swój sposób różna, i wspiera zupełnie inne podejście do rozgrywki
+ Masa grywalnych ras: co więcej, nie jesteśmy ograniczeni do jednej; kształtowanie relacji z innymi frakcjami pozwala na rozgrywanie misji fabularnych z ich wsparciem
+ Część doświadczonych jednostek z misji możemy zachować do swojej prywatnej "gwardii", dzięki czemu możemy zacząć z nimi misję
-/+ Grafika nieco się zestarzała, lecz wciąż jest czytelna
-/+ Główne misje kampanii są w sumie jednakowe, niezależnie od wyborów fabularnych. Gra się nieco inaczej, ale finał zawsze pozostaje taki sam
- System budowania murów i wież jest na prawdę kiepski

review: An unsung wonder. A great way to waste a bit of time. Easy way to play something engaging but not time consuming. Sometimes needs a bit of tweaking on a modern machine. It is abadonware, but there are fan support sites around. Being an older game, it runs well enough on lower spec'd laptops and light computers. For the cost, pick it up and try it. It's a great version of the old 4x4 RTS games with lots of species and tons of units. Medium well voices for the era.

author: {'steamid': '76561198161491482', 'num_games_owned': 85, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 654, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 654, 'last_played': 1536687054}
review:
Um belo tesouro dos tempos antigos

Foi um achado nas lojas americanas em torno de 2005 ou 2006...
Um jogo a principio muito simples, mas repleto de diversão! 
Ao estilo age of empires, warcraft entre outros, esse jogo te leva em uma aventura desbravando diversas localizações e em uma história de conflito entre raças.
Com quase 20 raças para escolher e mais outras 20 classes para seu herói, o jogo te da infinitas possibilidades para criar o exército mais poderoso possível! Sem contar que todas as raças tem tropas diferentes, contruções diferentes, atuam a noite ou de dia, possuem máquinas, ou cavalaria, ou arqueiros, ou magos, etc. 

PONTOS POSITIVOS:
-Para o ano do jogo os gráficos são bons
-Diversas raças para escolher
-Muitas possibilidade de classes para seu herói como: warrior, Summoner, Merchant, etc.
-Customização do seu herói como nome, voz, imagem e aparência
-Equipamentos para seu herói
-Contratação de mercenários e generais
-Situações inesperadas 
-Guerras súbitas de muita pancadaria
-Missões sempre dinâmicas e diferentes a cada nível
-Opções de aliança ou inimizade entre raças
-Fácil aprendizado ao longo do tempo

PONTOS NEGATIVOS
- Algumas missões repetitivas 
- Se você possuir um herói forte, pode vencer quase todas as fases sozinho ( sem tropas)
- Você não tem um atalho para salvar, e tem que ficar abrindo o menu salvando o tempo todo o jogo
- É muito divertido jogar multiplayer, porém não existem muitos players jogando atualmente
- Alguns controles de comando para as tropas podem ser dificeis no começo
- Por ser um jogo antigo, não tem muita otimização para os pc's de hoje, e vira e mexe o alt+tab buga o jogo e o  desktop

CONCLUSÃO:
O preço está muito acessível e o jogo vale a pena conhecer.
Garanto que terão diversão em uma aventura solo ou criando partidas customizadas contra até 6 AI, ou amigos em multiplayer. Vale a pena conhecer todas as raças também, que são muito bem feitas.

author: {'steamid': '76561198008924925', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1407, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1376, 'last_played': 1530397296}
review:
Bietet zum Vorgänger zwar ein paar neue Features und einige neue Rassen, jedoch macht das das Spiel eher unübersichtlicher und gerade Magie und Fähigkeiten eher spezieller. Vorallem aber sehr instabil und stürtzt ständig ab (Win7).
Das Helden-System ist etwas unausgewogen (Kampf-Helden aus meiner Sicht am stärksten, und das bringt ab einem hohen Level das Balancing durcheinander, wenn man eine übermächtige Figur hat).
Nur für Fans und Nostalgiker, aber da empfehle ich den Vorgänger.
(Zudem auf Steam nur in englischer Sprache)

author: {'steamid': '76561198013523282', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1784, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 882, 'last_played': 1681022914}
review:
Игра отличная, хотя и сложная, играл в нее лет 15 назад и теперь в нее тоже интересно играть. 16 обсолютно разных рас, герой и его свита переходит из боя в бой. Большое количество типов урона и брони. Хотя графика конечно очень слабая и баланс оставляет желать лучшего.
P.S. На windows 10 игра ни разу не вылетела.

author: {'steamid': '76561198021617723', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 1441, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 510, 'last_played': 1709441548}
review: Really love this game, however the version Steam is selling has an unofficial patch installed. It might fix some bugs from the last offical version (1.03) but also introduces some really shitty gameplay changes such as timed summons (making any type of summoner or summoning faction underpowered by a huge margin. Also added "bitches" to an alert when your buildings are being converted. (which happens alot)... Overall I am so annoyed that steam is selling an unofficially patched game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198001439039', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1580, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1549, 'last_played': 1527682890}
review:
어릴 때 PC잡지의 부록에 딸려와서 이걸 잡고 몇주간 개노가다를 했던 기억이 있어서 다시 해봤는데 역시 재밌다.

RTS + RPG 장르로써 무한히 레벨을 키울 수 있는 영웅을 가진 채로 전략시뮬레이션 게임을 한다.

영웅 레벨을 하나도 키우지 않아도 컨트롤만 잘한다면 엔딩까지 볼 수 있지만, 이 게임의 재미는 레벨업.

레벨이 오를때마다 영웅의 능력치가 쥐꼬리만큼씩 올라서 쌓이다보면 강해진다.

극단적으로 레벨 노가다를 하면 결국엔 영웅과 엘리트 유닛만으로 겜 시작하자마자 다 쓸어버릴 때까지 노가다가 가능하며

몇십종류나 되는 종족, 영웅의 직업이 있고 그것들 간의 밸런스는 개판이지만, 나중에 익숙해지면 일부러 약한 종족을 골라서 키워가는 재미도 쏠쏠하다.

노가다 좋아하는 사람은 이 게임을 오래 즐길수 있음.

review: I played this game for hundreds of hours back when it came out over a decade ago.  I love this game.  It's still great and the video just doesn't do it justice.  The hero creation gives this game endless replayability, there are like 8 or 9 highly unique and well balanced factions.  You units that did really well in battle can end up being hero's that you can bring into your next battle which is really fun and well done.  There is soo much done right about this game.  Everything is so well done in this game it's so underrated it's not even funny.

author: {'steamid': '76561198366436199', 'num_games_owned': 120, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2033, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1370, 'last_played': 1593988796}
review:
I've been playing Warlords Battlecry II for over 2 years, about a week ago I have bought a Warlords Battlecry III and I highly recommend it for everyone that like Strategy games. The difference between WBC II and WBC III surprised me, for example couple more races, new maps, troops etc. There is also a difference between those two games, in WBC II you've just wanted to take over all of the available "points" on the map and that was it. In WBC III you can replay few battles to gain more experience or crowns, you can hire mercenaries, you can even buy and sell items if you want.

That's all from me. I hope that most of the people will buy this game, as it is really worth it.
Thank you. :)

author: {'steamid': '76561197985044488', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 499, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 424, 'last_played': 1647850401}
review: Imbalanced perma-leveling mechanics and itemization, goofy B-grade voice lines, and issues that still haven't been resolved after years. author: {'steamid': '76561198054387451', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 290, 'playtime_forever': 8419, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 333, 'last_played': 1707173546}
review:
Truly the more "retro" Warcraft III !
--------------------------------------------
And again, a good example, that RTS & RPG go hand-in-hand, as well!

Another game, warmly remembered from the earlier days.
Still holds up with its cross-over game play, soundtrack and great replay-ability!

Another CLASSIC gem!

author: {'steamid': '76561198022950203', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 4242, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1625, 'last_played': 1560326509}
review:
老遊戲，純粹是重溫它的設計和遊戲性，畫面和音效當然不能和現在的遊戲相提並論。豐富的種族，自由度極高的英雄，多到記不清的單位是一大特色。
有興趣體驗的朋友，無論喜歡何種英雄，領導技能必要投資，否則有強大的護衛也帶不出去。後期有些關卡難度頗高，強大的護護衛對過關有決定的影響。
另一特色是英雄有私人錢包，可以購買傭兵或是裝備。某些英雄技能可以用魔法創造裝備和藥水，那些裝備是永久的，如不需要可以拿去賣，所以有製造技能的英雄永遠不缺錢，這是蠻有趣的設計。

author: {'steamid': '76561198263972389', 'num_games_owned': 126, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 12260, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11160, 'last_played': 1492696832}
review: brings me back to my childhood...will never forget this game

author: {'steamid': '76561198078489826', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 183, 'playtime_forever': 290, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 271, 'last_played': 1610618521}
review:
It's like warcraft 3, but the hero mechanics is taken to amazing depths.

You can have summoners, "leaders" (provide morale/eco boosts), fighters, mages, and any mixture of the four that will and do change the battlefield in your favor - granted you grind the campaign (or skirmish) long enough.

Said heroes are entirely customizable and can be moved from campaign to skirmish to multiplayer matches with relative ease, the concept is wonderful and hasn't been reproduced in any other RTS that I know of.

There are around ten or so different races, with different art and tech trees, but they're hardly impactful. The spotlight is on the heroes (and for good reasons).

I really recommend this without the forced mod that gives a timer to summoned units though, takes the fun out of playing demons (or any summoner type).

author: {'steamid': '76561198124792488', 'num_games_owned': 76, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 318, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 169, 'last_played': 1681002400}

author: {'steamid': '76561198157115785', 'num_games_owned': 331, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 43, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1602644457}

author: {'steamid': '76561198146080176', 'num_games_owned': 128, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 6593, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 657, 'playtime_at_review': 932, 'last_played': 1711908890}
review:
Zajebista gra strategiczna  
Po pierwsze można zagrać wieloma frakcjami oraz wybrac swojego bohatera także różnej rasy .
tryb multiplayer aby zagrac z innymi graczami .
Po drugie jest edytor map gdzie można stworzyć własna mape , jest on bardzo rozbudowany na którym znajdziemy wszystko co może dotyczyc gry,  postacie,  budynki itp. 
Możemy stworyć mape jaka nam sie podoba jedyne co może nas ograniczyć to nasza wyobraźnie a wiem że prawdziwym graczom jej nie brakuje .
Pozatym jeśli to dla was mało to musicie usłyszeć muzyke która leci w tej grze naprawde robi zajebisty  klimat.
Nie opisałem wszytkiego co możecie tam znaleźć , ale mi najlepszą frajde sprawiło gdy sam wszystko odkrywałem w tej grze
Polecam i pozdrawiam :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198108383681', 'num_games_owned': 877, 'num_reviews': 1059, 'playtime_forever': 760, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 335, 'last_played': 1675075798}
review:
Maybe you won't believe, but I played this game more than 20 000 hours back then when it wasn't on Steam. This was my first CD (my friend asked and broke it that si what I heard T_T) on my first PC (2004). In 2004-2005 when I was with my classmates in crafting lesson, I asked my classmate make a wooden heart (that is what we were doing) because I couldn't make it by myself, so then I coloured it and wrote "Warlords Battlecry 3" on it. And since then I played this game non-stop. I finished game infinite times, I was the first one who made XP boost map, I made tons of campaign and mission maps for my friends. I even created Van Hellsing map on Warlords Battlecry 1. I usually played as Ssrathi assassin. Assassin was best class for surviving (in Warlords Battlecry 1 it was Undead with his vampirism and attack speed it was impossible to kill him). Only one who could fight assassin was paladin (for his reviving and healing spells). But the minus of this game was that the towers were getting stronger with every hero level. Several times I wanted to get rights for this game, because it was already dead game and I wanted to brought to Steam, but unfortunately, there were a lot of problmes that I had must solve. Despite of its year this game was balanced, even more than Warcraft 3. And that is one of the reasons why I think it is unfair to make cybersport games due to their companies. This game brought us great story, epic OSTs, shedloads of spells, skills and strategy game mechanics, and more importantly as I know the first game that brought MMO RPG thing, infinite hero level gaining, to us. Warlords Battlecry 3 was the legend and is still the best game and the best RTS game for me!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_WT1WX0H0oQ

P.S. I had got goosebumps right now when I launched it <3 <3 <3

author: {'steamid': '76561198047997450', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 111, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5, 'last_played': 1605100685}
review:
2017. 11. 18.
Egyik kedvenc volt ez a játék, de Steam-en valamiért nem indul el. Vicces, hogy 5 perc játékidőt értem el a sok próbálgatással, de még egy intro kép sem jött be. Kénytelen vagyok azt feltételezni, hogy bugos.

2020. 06. 27.
Újra telepítettem, most már elindul. Tutorial végigment, a kampányból kidobott, skirmish működik. Valamiért iszonyat lagol. Most azon agyalok, hogy régen is ilyen volt-e...

2020. 11. 11.
Nos, újra megpróbáltam, ezúttal csak a skirmish módot. Nagyon akad, kínlódik. A hangok jók, de egyébként játszhatatlan. Feladom.

author: {'steamid': '76561198005500753', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 2481, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1984, 'last_played': 1551229050}
review: I played this game a lot in the past. Its still as good as I remember!! Lots of classes and specializations for your hero and many armies with their own playstyles. Each unit has its own traits and skills as well. Putting all of these together makes a game with multiple stategies. Visually looks as an old game but it has another visual appeal that will make you forget that and keep you playing. Excellent game!

author: {'steamid': '76561198044316945', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 488, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 120, 'last_played': 1514743912}
review:
Ах, какая же это ностальгия!!!
Помню мне на день рождения в еще далеком 2005 году подарили много дисков с играми, но запомнилась мне только эта. Она даже сподвигла меня на написание повести, во до чего!
Такое обилие рас, классов, титанов, механика игры... Бесподобно, и даже сейчас эта игра для меня остается одной из лучших стратегий.
Со временем диск потерялся, и какое же было счастье, когда я обнаружил эту игру в стиме)
Единственное что она у меня порой подлагивает, некритично, но все же. Видать мой комп слишком мощный для нее))) Ну а русификатор я скачал и играю как раньше. Доволен как слон, в общем!

author: {'steamid': '76561198064884499', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 1433, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 457, 'last_played': 1585481890}
review: This was one of the best RTS/RPG games available. author: {'steamid': '76561198024195554', 'num_games_owned': 6896, 'num_reviews': 310, 'playtime_forever': 3145, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2934, 'last_played': 1507902415}
review:
Довольно неплохая стратегия с большим количеством рас и прокачкой героя. Основная добыча ресурсов осуществляется путём захвата шахт, которые уже имеются на карте. Также имеется возможность переносить выживших вояк из сражения в сражение, так называемая свита, которая тоже набирает опыт и становится мощнее обычных воинов.
Первое, что придётся делать игроку в данной игре – создать своего героя. Здесь это является фишкой, поскольку именно от этого будет зависеть тактика игры и её прохождение. Однако, это может стать и проблемой. Подсказки о том, что даёт та или иная раса и класс персонажей можно найти в интернете, а ещё можно найти русификатор, что я всем и советую. Я сам остановился на убийце из высших эльфов. Почему? – Просто мне нужен был герой с возможностью победить кого угодно, а прокачавшись он смог выучить заклинания из школы лечения. Возможно кому-то это поможет определиться, а кому-то захочется экспериментов. Вариантов море! Мой вариант привёл меня к тому, что через некоторое время мне не нужна была отстройка базы; я вполне мог обойтись начальным отрядом и героем, чтобы всех сокрушить. 
Кстати, поиграть этим же героем можно не только в кампании, но и в одиночке. Если пройдёте кампанию, то многие сражения можно повторять бесконечное число раз. По сравнению с предыдущими частями выросло количество рас и классов, которых и так было довольно много. Однако, если в прошлой части я выбирал архимага из обречённых (здесь они называются феями), то в этой части архимаги не столь привлекательны и не могут выучить все заклинания. Но в целом, если сравнивать с предыдущими частями – игры очень похожи и если Вы в них играли, то без труда освоитесь. Если же Вы новичок, но любите стратегии с элементами рпг для главного героя, то тоже легко освоитесь. Играть в игры этой серии мне было приятно! Эту часть я пропустил, но Стим помог мне со знакомством и прохождением данной игры, чему я рад.

author: {'steamid': '76561198274194349', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 2762, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2417, 'last_played': 1508490703}
review:
It's a great game if your heros file doesn't become corrupted.  And God forbid you play in ironman mode.  Do that and all your heros go to well  you know what I mean.
Oh I like the graphics on Warlords Battlecry 2 more.  Seems like they took a step back creating the graphics for this one. Ofcourse I am not sure if Ubisoft made this one. Before you play I advise you tto go to your Warlords battle cry folder where the herosdata file is located and change turn off the read only in and then and set the warlords battlecry exe to run as Admin.

author: {'steamid': '76561198212605888', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 748, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 524, 'last_played': 1531769197}
review:
This game proves its ok to have your RTS be completely unrealistic and have a sense of humor. It took them three games for Warlords Battlecry to perfect the strategy/rpg elements/affectionate parody formula but it was worth the wait. 

Its not perfect though, as it develops a bug that keeps a skirmish from ending properly if you tab out and tab back in, and it arguably is a bit too geared towards resource management, but these are not deal breakers for a game that is only a little over $10. 

Very good for something its price and obscurity.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011787701', 'num_games_owned': 395, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 3247, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2938, 'last_played': 1589374554}
review:
Used to spend more hours on this game than any other RTS back in the days. It is a good game but now that i came back from a year "ish" long time withouth the game it seems to have the flickering cursor bug every time i start the game and it seems to crash more than ever before.

This was not an issue when i first got the game here on steam but reading on the forums you seem to have to hop through a lot of hoops to get it to run properly and the way they force you to use a mod that pretty much ruin a lot of builds is just shamefull.

This game was good back in the days but it is just not worth trying to get it to run properly and even having fun with the changes they added. If you really want to pick this game up check out the gog version instead.

author: {'steamid': '76561198120321645', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 5849, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3461, 'last_played': 1653561286}
review: Velmi dobrá strategická hra. Mám nahráno stovky hodin na oficiální český verzi 1.3, která má ovšem velmi mnoho chyb. Za 50 hodin u této verze jsem chyby nenašel. Ve hře je přes 20 unikátních národů, přes 25 profecí pro hrdiny, velký rozsah jednotek, stovky různého vybavení pro hrdiny, desítky avatarů pro hrdiny. V kampani vlastními diplomatickými rozhodnutími utváříte vztahy s jinými národy. Některé národy mají s své bonusy proti jiným národům (ork vs. rytíř, trpaslík vs. elf, barbar vs . ssrathi, ...). Hru mohu určitě doporučit, užil jsem si spoustu srandy při hraní. Njevětším kladem je určitě rozmanitost a možnosti ve hře. =)

author: {'steamid': '76561198098342214', 'num_games_owned': 10629, 'num_reviews': 595, 'playtime_forever': 4181, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2831, 'last_played': 1699362026}
review:
[h1]Warlords Battlecry lll é um jogo muito bom de estratégia que foca em batalhas por diferentes raças e heróis com diferentes habilidades[/h1]

O jogo é sensacional, o mesmo basicamente só consiste apenas em um modo Campanha e Skirmish excelentes e um Multiplayer não muito funcional.
Mas o que faz esse jogo ser mais interessante que outros jogos de Estratégia que eu joguei, é por causa do sistema de heróis em que você pode fazer vários tipos de combinações de habilidades e ainda com um sistema meio "RPG" de XP e level acredito que quase infinito, podendo então melhorar seu Herói ao ponto de você ficar OP demais dependendo da sua estratégia ao escolher uma classe e habilidades.

Quanto ao contexto geral dos heróis, suas classes e habilidades acho bastante difícil explicar de modo breve e satisfatório nessa análise, então caso você vá jogar esse jogo pela primeira vez eu sugiro você dar uma pesquisada antes seja por videos ou guias, pra ver se te agrada.

Então a campanha em si a história é Ok, nada muito "sensacional", mas do lançamento da época eu achei ela bem interessante, inclusive a campanha creio eu que foi um dos modos mais jogados por mim, pois depois que você zera você pode reiniciar a campanha inteira e rejogar e eu adorava fazer isso na época que eu jogava por CD.
O modo Skirmish contém vários mapas interessantes, mas o que mais curti é o fato de ser possível colocar mais mapas criados por outros jogadores ou até criado por você pelo modo Editor.

[b]Problemas[/b]
O jogo é antigo, então é normal problemas surgirem conforme o tempo vai passando.
O mesmo tem um problema as vezes de não querer abrir na sua primeira vez, principalmente no Windows 8 e 10, portanto não é o fim do mundo nesse caso pois aparentemente há solução pra esses crashs, bastando você pesquisar no fórum do jogo em inglês aqui no Steam e tentar todas as soluções possíveis caso você esteja tentando e não conseguiu.
Vale ressaltar que também essa versão do jogo no Steam é uma versão não oficial que eles resolveram inserir para balancear o jogo, que acabou afetando uma parte divertida dos heróis sumonadores colocando timer nas summons, eu recomendo você dar um downgrade pra versão anteriores, se pesquisar direitinho no fórum do jogo também consegue de boa, mas só faça isso se realmente acha que vai te afetar e se não for sua primeira vez que você vai jogar e você já tem alguma experiência com o que estou citando.

[b]Vale a pena comprar?[/b]
Sim. O jogo é muito bom, no meu caso ele se torna muito interessante por causa do sistema de heróis, definitivamente um dos jogos que eu mais joguei no passado e é difícil esquecer uma belezinha dessa. 
Então se por acaso você já tiver jogado esse jogo antes e tiver curtido, provavelmente você irá querer comprar de novo, agora se for a sua primeira vez então eu sugiro ver uns videos antes na net pra ter certeza se vai curtir ou não.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056963900', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 12, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1502556293}
review:
Incredible old game, but also doesn't run on most versions of windows short of jumping through hoops, running old compatibility modes and re-installing video card drivers. 

If you are willing to deal with the above, by all means. To be quite honest it's a huge disappointement.

author: {'steamid': '76561198227584400', 'num_games_owned': 87, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 9484, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4378, 'last_played': 1710740068}
review:
Uno de los mejores juegos de RTS que he jugado. incluso mejor que age of empires , tiene mas variedad de razas y distintos modos de juego. y su sistema de recursos me parece peculiar , por medio de dominacion.
Este juego te asegura horas y horas de divercion. Creme te lo dice alguien que jugo a esto en su infancia y aun le sigue gustando.
 Y lo mejor de todo esta en español gracias a un parche de la comunidad , no hace falta buscar mucho para encontrarlo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198038727638', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 28460, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18417, 'last_played': 1575143439}
review: I love this game it's a lot of fun, when it works.  I have invested over 300 hours in it.  However, I would not recommend this to anyone for the simple reason that the game files can become corrupted for no apparent reason and all your characters and campaigns are lost and not recoverable.  After this happened to me today I tried uninstalling and reinstalling it but it doesn't work and you cannot simply create a new character to start over with because it will not save that new character.  Effectively making your game garbage.  Really bugs me because I absolutely love this game but I guess it's time to move on.

author: {'steamid': '76561198261666336', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 2173, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 687, 'last_played': 1633931874}
review:
Классика.
Сама по себе игра потрясающая, с действительно богатым миром- как кампания, так и простая резня. Непревзойденное количество рас на сегодняшний день, количество различных комбинаций вроде раса\класс героя зашкаливает и направляется к бесконечности.
Однако же импорт подкачал. Нет доступа к стим оверлей, отсутствие широкоформатного разрешения, периодические баги и вылеты, баланс звука, локализация.... Мне кажется, к импорту в стим игру стоило несколько доработать. Однако же 300+часов, проведенных за ней в детстве на пиратке - определенно того стоили. Фанатам РТС пойдет на пользу знакомство с игрой и гарантирует приятное времяпрепровождение

author: {'steamid': '76561198170785126', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 3020, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1958, 'last_played': 1497955263}
review:
It's fun. Unbalanced, but fun. Actually, taking Balance out of the equation is probably what makes it fun. How many RTS games do you know where you only get three factions and there's not really much that sets them apart? The factions in this game have completely different playstyles, advantages, and disadvantages. Knights have good cavalry, but electricity and flyers can make their lives hell. Anything that isn't elven has access to siege equipment, with Dark Dwarves getting the cool stuff. You can be snake-people, plague-bearing abominations with hydras, Conan The Barbarians, minotaurs, Undead Humans, Knights, Humans-that-aren't-knights-or-barbarians (they get mages but are kind of boring), fey-cretins, grossly misinterpreted orcs (it says those units are kobolds and gnolls, but they do not look like it), and daemons for maximum edge in case DarkSpiderElves wasn't edgy enough. 

Your hero unit can be of a race separate from the Faction you play as, and you can make Dumb things like a daemonic paladin, or a fey Dragonslayer, or you can play an archetype straight. It progresses like an RPG character, slowly growing in power as it wins fights. Advancement is simple enough to be done mid-battle, and if you're a trickster, you can use the lairs on maps that spawn NPCs that are hostile to everyone at regular intervals to farm EXP for you or your troops, or destroy them to release a Very Powerful Unit close to an enemy base. 

The graphics are two dimensional, polished-up versions of the original game's sprites. So, they're dated. Not to the point that you should be unable to tell what you're looking at (in most cases), but enough to have that constant air of cheesiness about it. But the cheese is good! Most of the time, anyway. 

The campaign is more RPG than RTS. You're sailing on a ship when a Portal To Hell opens up on some island, and it turns out something is trying to escape the portal in order to go wreak havoc upon The World, and for some reason it's your job to stop it. Bland stuff, nothing really groundbreaking in terms of plot, but it's fun for what it is. Just watch out for when the campaign randomly decides to throw a lvl 75 hero at you when you're barely lvl 20. 

It's important to switch on Compatability mode on any computer that isn't a complete dinosaur, and maybe downgrade the version a bit to the last official release if you aren't digging the setup that got released here that is riddled with text popups about how your buildings are being converted that'll make you wonder if a thirteen-year-old modded this for the re-release. Easy enough fix with the proper files.

My only real criticism apart from some of the design oversights is that, if you want to play as a female, your only real options are humans or elves. No lizard women or daemon women, no zamby women, no plaguemonster women, no minot- wait not having minotauresses kinda makes sense. I've seen Kung Pow: cows are either OP or have a glaring weak point. There is no middle ground.

Vee's Rating: It's as good as any generic fantasy is going to be, but with knight-druidesses and their harems of dryad-chicks and crazy fiery salamanders and succubi. Good cartoon, dumb fun, would watch more of.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028348385', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 4785, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2135, 'last_played': 1701651592}
review:
My undead hero had his elite personal retinue. It had 2 Doom Slayers(Hruldorn and Morik). Both served a bodyguard role. Morik guarded the hero, and Hruldorn guarded my general. My general, a humble and kind Russian-sounding vampire by the name of Zelgin. 

 Zelgin was a good man. He was a part of many operations undertaken by the Undead Empire. But then, the foul Orcs killed him. He was slain in an attack at  FOB-3 by an Orc horde. The base fell, and most personal were slain. Hruldorn, Zelgin's bodyguard, survived and escaped back to our main base. 

 This devastated our military efforts. The fall of the FOB, alongside the death of Zelgin and his men slashed us. Morale fell. But we reorganized our efforts. We sat, and we waited, we mined more resources, set up more fortifications, and kept the Orcs at bay. Barely, every time. We waited further. As my army expanded, we got ready for the attack. Then, with 180 men, 4 dragon liches, Zelgin's replacement, Lord Bane, and my Hero, we marched proudly through our fortifications. An hour later, every building the Orcs had was burning, or was already ashes. Their hero units and generals were dead, and we raised them back as skeletons aganist the feeble resistance that was their fractured forces. By the end of the conflict, the Undead had control of the entire map. Zelgin's death had a lit a fire for us, a fire of revenge that eviscerated the Orcs.  
 
Rest in Piece, Zelgin. You were the best Cool-Soviet-Vampire-best friend I could ever have. Until your replacement outlevels you, at least.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013938936', 'num_games_owned': 327, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 5397, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1675, 'last_played': 1579064061}
review:
From the series I have only played Warlords Battlecry III, but it is a big favorite of mine nevertheless.

[h1]The RTS Side[/h1]

As you probably know, Warlords Battlecry III is a Real Time Strategy (RTS) game, just like the Age Of ___ games or Starcraft, Warcraft. What makes it unique is its large amount of races to play with - 16 to be exact - from Elves to Dwarves, Minotaurs, Daemons, different reptiles, etc.

There is a conversion mechanism for buildings - some units can perform a [i]convert[/i] action which will turn nearby buildings to the player's side. This is how the resources (Gold, Crystal, Metal and Stone) are handled - you have to convert the mines which will produce for you.

[h1]The RPG Side[/h1]

A neat feature in Warlords Battlecry III is that the player has their own hero, a superunit who stays with the player between battles and gains experience to level up. There is a huge list of classes to pick for the Hero, such as Merchant, Dragonslayer, Pyromancer, etc.

Heroes can learn spells in many different spell schools - Alchemy, Chaos, Divination, Nature, Poison, Necromancy, and of course the basic ones like Fire or Ice. Additionally, Heroes have an Equipment and Inventory system - with Set items to collect too.

[h1]The Gameplay Side[/h1]

Warlords Battlecry III offers a Campaign Mode to take on with a unique storyline.

The player can take their hero to independent battles in Skirmish Mode and play on either randomly generated or manual maps with up to 5 AIs.

Lastly, there is an Editor in which the player can assemble their own maps.

[h1]Last Words[/h1]

RTS + RPG, perfectly falls in a good old game category. Definitely recommended.

author: {'steamid': '76561197964866568', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 208, 'playtime_forever': 1232, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 459, 'last_played': 1665757682}
review:
Get the Protectors mod. The game's source has been released for free some time ago.
The mod is better. The balance on Steam is just ridiculously not funny on Single Player. Doesn't have updated resolution support either.
The mod is:
1) FREE and Standalone
2) Has full HD resolution support (1920x1080)
3) Actually balanced for fun, with a lot of additions and changes
4) Offers additional campaign and scenarios (on top of the old ones)

SO I HIGHLY RECOMMEND TO PLAY THIS AWESOME GAME!
Just be aware that the Steam release is so... so limited and - for my liking - broken.

I was not into mods for this game, but I got so annoying with it that I gave it a go and I am glad that I did!

author: {'steamid': '76561198163990959', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 25674, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 25135, 'last_played': 1667241667}
review:
As another old guy who played this game growing up, it's fun to be able to go back and play it from start to finish on a current gaming system. There are *many* drawbacks* to this version of the game, however, that would prevent me from recommending it to others.

1) This is NOT the game in its original form - it's a mod. Things have been changed, and from what I can tell, those changes are largely detrimental. For example, many magic classes summon various units from basic infantry and fliers to elite generals and champions. In the original game, these magically summoned units were permanent, and as such, they made the classes viable - some of them were downright lethal. In this version of WB3, however, every summoned unit has a timer (unless you're going up against an AI magic hero, in which case, all of their summoned units are permanent), and the only units that persist for your side are those you send into mines which is helpful, but this change renders most of the magic classes completely useless which effectively cuts the game content in half.

2) There are LOTS of bugs that are a result of older games being quick-adapted to current systems. Resolution rendering doesn't work at all, so prepare yourself for mid-90s-quality graphics and sound. Additionally and *much* more importantly, the game's Ironman Mode (which nets heroes double experience in exchange for making said hero a permadeath one) doesn't work at all which is to say, that you can create an Ironman hero, but the instant you stop playing, your hero is deleted. I've heard that there are ways around this issue, but without a clear-cut solution, I'm not about to go playing around with my computer's internal processes.

3) Some of the changes made in the game are really just lazy coding. Example, structures that produce flying units aren't supposed to be available until Keep lvl 3 (apparent from the building requirements detailed in-game), but every single race in this version of WB3 is capable of building flying unit structures at Keep lvl 2. Some races - like the Dwarves and Orcs - are even capable of producing their Titan at Keep lvl 4 when Titans are supposed to be a Keep lvl 5 exclusive unit across the board.

Have I spent hundreds and hundreds of hours playing the game? Yup, because it's still better than most of the cash-grab rubbish being put out today, but were it not such a nostalgic experience, these (among others) are issues that would prevent me from enjoying this game as much as I do. As such, I cannot recommend it to others.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030207236', 'num_games_owned': 778, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 8, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8, 'last_played': 1479998691}
review:
Warlords Battlecry II и III были поистине чудесными представителями своего времени. Третья часть остается непревзойденной во многих аспектах до сих пор (просто потому что создателям лень так тщательно прорабатывать игры), а жаль.
WARNING! Не путать с серией Warlords. Warlords Battlecry совершенно другие.

Особенности: 
[list]
[*][b] 16 уникальных рас[/b]
Это [i]~300 уникальных юнитов[/i] со своими моделями, анимациями, умениями, сильными и слабыми сторонами. 
Это [i]198 различных строений[/i] с анимацией постройки. До сих пор во всех играх с множеством рас, юниты просто перекрашиваются или серая масса имеет парочку отличающихся. Но только здесь всё действительно уникально.
При этом сохранен баланс. Нет откровенно плохих или хороших рас: они все заточены под разные стили и стратегии игры.

[*][b]28 классов героев, 103 умения и 130 заклинаний[/b] 
Тратили весь день на выбор расы, класса и создание мордашки в [b]TES[/b]? 16×28. Добро пожаловать в ваш персональный ад.

[*][b]Механика атаки и защиты[/b] 
Броня и маг резист? [b]WBIII[/b] смеется им в лицо. 7 типов атак и сопротивления/уязвимости к ним у юнитов. 5 типов промахов/попаданий. Плюс, критические атаки обладают своими особенностями. Например, ледяная атака подморозит зад незадачливому оппоненту, а колющая - пробьет защиту.
Естественно, не обошлось и без классических типов юнитов: летающий, гигант, маленький, кавалерия и т.д., против которых могут быть сильны/слабы те или иные войска. Да и раса сыграет свою роль: гномы по эльфам будут лупить втрое охотнее, чем по кому бы то ни было.

[*][b]Уровень воинов[/b]
Вы думаете это просто циферки убийств? Скажете это, когда герой будет бегать по всей карте от простенького воина 20го уровня.

[*][b]Добыча ресурсов[/b]
Всего их 4 и они добываются шахтами, которые нужно держать под контролем, которые обращаются героем или его генералом (или фениксом). Большинство рас в той или иной степени привержены к определенному ресурсу или ресурсам, что нужно учитывать в войне за контроль.

[*][b]Призыв юнитов других рас[/b]
Не хватает собственных юнитов, а личный отряд героя уже заполнен? Всегда можно вызвать парочку горячих крылатых парней из обливиона (плети для наказания прилагаются)

[*][b]Изменяющаяся история кампании[/b]
Помимо главной ветки вам придется встревать в распри кланов или рас, и от вашего выбора история (а также список доступных квестов и наград) будет меняться. Уже не говоря о том, что каждая миссия будет по разному проходиться разной расой: для одной это будет легкая прогулка, в то время как за другую это будет сущий ад.

[*]и последний плюс, которого, к сожалению, нет в стим версии
[b]Локализация[/b]
Как всегда чудесная локализация [b]Акеллы[/b]. Конечно, число озвучек героев было нехило урезано, но они были! Полными, эмоциональными и не менее крутыми, чем оригинальные. Про все переведенные тексты и мануалы вообще молчу.

В руководствах выложен русификатор, но маловероятно, что он будет работать адекватно, увы. В игре было три патча, все из которых применены здесь. В третьем были изменены здания тёмных эльфов, добавлена масса предметов и целая глава кампании. Но [b]Акелла[/b] поддерживала игру только вплоть до второго, увы. А в связи с тем, что библиотеки игры едины (описания, тексты кампании и пр. хранятся в едином файле), неизвестно как она поведет себя, если вы столкнетесь с чем-то из третьего патча.

К слову о мануалах, в них описаны характеристики героев, зависящие от расы и от класса. In-game выбор будет больше напоминать рандом - узнаете что он такое только после выбора и раскачки персонажа.
[/list]

[b]В заключение:[/b]
Эта игра ввела множество инновационных вещей в 2004. В этой игре нет ни "супер-лучников", которые смогут нелогично бить цель сквозь башню, ни стрел, таинственным образом преследующих цель всю дорогу. Орки могут подбирать декоративных коров и использовать их в качестве оружия, или можно поймать и закинуть овцу в катапульту. Герои заклинаниями могут случайно вызывать квестовые награды или пополнять свою книгу случайным заклинанием.
Очень много механик и вещей, для RTS не свойственных, либо которых вообще не делал никто, боясь взорвать пользователю мозг. [b]Это Command&Conquer или Starcraft, только с 16 расами вместо трёх. После неё все RTS кажутся слишком простыми и унылыми.

В общем, это игра разрывающая шаблоны. Одному богу известно, сколько времени просидели разработчики над балансом и крайне печально, что больше таких игр не было, ни до, ни после.[/b]

review:

Pros:

-Unique Races (Go Knights!!)
-RTS + RPG = Omfg *explodes* in short... you can level up your Hero and other Troops

author: {'steamid': '76561198015039963', 'num_games_owned': 231, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 2892, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 589, 'last_played': 1685719796}
review:
Que dire, j'ai grandi avec les Warlords , du coup j'ai rejouer à ce jeux par nostalgie ( et elle a bien fait effet ) , un univers med fantastique , pleins de races jouables , une campagne qui s'adapte au niveau de votre héros et que l'on peux faire avec celui que l'on veux ( pas comme dans le 1er , oû seul les humains étaient dispo en temps que héros ) . Pas mal d'améliorations comparé aux autres opus de la série. 

Mais mon dieu, les graphismes ont pas changer et malgré toute la nostalgie que j'ai éprouvé , sa fait mal aux yeux ... 

Malgré cela le jeux est fun et avec un comparce en LAN  vous pourez trouver à bien vous marrer le temps d'une aprés midi pluvieuse.

Have Fun !!

author: {'steamid': '76561198102015573', 'num_games_owned': 349, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 60, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 57, 'last_played': 1477659096}
review: One of my very first PC games, i love this strategy style :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198219376027', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 21888, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 260, 'last_played': 1676249658}
review: Overall, this is an awesome re-release of a classic RTS game that I have loved for years!  I could even import my old hero from the original version with no problems!  My only complaint is that they added time limits to summoned creatures, which makes my hero (a level 41 Summoner) a bit weaker, seeing as the level 5 Daemons she summons only last for about a minute and a half or so (haven't timed it to be sure, but that's what it feels like).  It definitely gets a solid 4/5!

author: {'steamid': '76561198138698155', 'num_games_owned': 668, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 1983, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 193, 'last_played': 1692585134}
review: Joguei boa parte da minha infancia esse jogo, e era o unico jogo no estilo RTS (estratégia em tempo real) com traços de RPG que eu pude jogar na época. Hoje pode ser visto como um jogo muito simples, mas a mecânica não era simples para a época, ainda não consigo achar um jogo como esse. Ele oferece uma mecânica diferente dos outros RTS's, mais simplificada, com raças e mobs dos mais diversificados. Contando o fator nostalgia esse jogo é 11/10, sem contar fica com um 8.5, o fato do jogo não ter tradução nativa para o Português não é um problema, há ela disponivel para baixar nos fórums da vida. A história do jogo é "okay" não é ela que vai te fazer jogar o jogo, mas sim a mecânica e a vontade de upar seu char.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970391065', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 3875, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3568, 'last_played': 1688034229}
review:
As I can tell that far, Steam once more sells incomplete software. There are known issues/bugs those are not mentioned at all, and as I know it from Steam, no usable support.
They just sell a buggy software from third developer to gain more money.

I know and love Warlords Battlecry 2, since it's not that easy to get it to run on todays hardware, I gave WB3 a try.

There are many little changes that destroys the Battlecry feeling for me, mostly about the hero development.

In WB2, you gained XP from a battle (in WB3, the ironman mode, the only mode besides standard, deletes your character after every battle, victorious or not) and you could choose your caste at level 2. But not every race could become everything, they had their specialities and restictions, but interesting cross-developments possibility due to special race boni.
At level 3 you could choose from different specialities. Then, with every new level, you could increase your stats, skills, perks or spells.

Now, in WB3, you can choose with every race every class right from the beginning. No race-specialities or restrictions. By level up you simply do a 'two click' improvement. Choose 1 stat point, then 1 skill point. Nothing more. No perks, no spelltree.

The campaign mode is refreshing, now you can deal with items and get very fast very rich. Buy troops, in every battle up to 20 additional units right from the beginning, next to the troops you can choose commonly for the fight and those you can summon.

There are some new races too (these new units are kinda Jurassic Park & Scorpion King remakes), but I need some more time to check them out completely (if I do that at all, I loved my mortal but strong hero back in WB2 in ironmode. Now, with no working ironman mode, it doesn't matter if you win, survive, die or whatever. You can gain 2 levels even by completely failing). Besides that, it is ridiculous easy now. Even 'very hard' battles are like a walk in the park.

My game crashes me back to desktop every second or third time I play.

Hint: don't buy this one, Steam doesn't deserve your money for that foul product! Look for the standalone "Protectors Mod" first, its for free, with working ironman mode and active support.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044915953', 'num_games_owned': 320, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 2174, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1578, 'last_played': 1636897173}
review: Really good classic. Whoever brought it to steam did a great job, however not a fan of their edits. When you're buildings are being converted it says something like "Your buildings are under attack bitches" Really immersion breaking when you flamboyant irl and you trying to be a psychopatic necromancer and you read that message and you're suddenly like "Drag that bitch by their edges!"

author: {'steamid': '76561198047156132', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 2798, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 823, 'last_played': 1514843104}
review: Warlords Battlecry III is a great game. It was back in 2003 and it's still is. I love everything about the Warlords Series, I've played Warlords 3 (turned based game back in 1995), Battlecry II, Warlords IV, I've also played puzzle quest 1 and 2 (puzzle quest 2 in related storywise to Warlords Battlecry III ). In order to run the game I had to install Direct Play but there was an error. I turned off the Avast shields before the install and everything worked. I also had to make the game exe file Windows 7 compatible (I am with Windows 10). After that I didn't have any problems to run the game. I have no crashes during the gameplay, everything works like a charm. I definitely recommend the game although I confess I don't like the graphics. I still hope that one day Battlecry IV will happen and it will be as great as its predecessors.

author: {'steamid': '76561197961545338', 'num_games_owned': 191, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 1901, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 541, 'last_played': 1541330845}
review:

it's in steam shop :) with a version that almost works :s

greeting from Drako

author: {'steamid': '76561197991617171', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 848, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 517, 'last_played': 1707672203}
review: Wer die legendäre Version des besten RPG Echtzeit-Strategie Spiels spielen möchte ist hier genau richtig. Man behält den Helden über die vielen Schlachten hinweg ob Kampagne, Multiplayer oder Zufalls-Maps. Einfach einmalig 16 Völker und unzählige verschiedene Einheiten. Man kann 29 Verschiedene Klassen für den Helden Wählen mit zahllosen Fähigkeiten und Zaubern. Krieger, Dachentöter, Heiler Nekromant, Beschwörer und Händler um nur einige Klassen zu nennen. Lediglich die Grafik ist etwas alt und es ist komplett in Englisch.

author: {'steamid': '76561198278752760', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1414, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 512, 'last_played': 1702819911}

author: {'steamid': '76561198136762705', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 198, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 198, 'last_played': 1466866902}
review:
One of the best Real Time Strategy titles of all time with Role Play Game elements spicing things up a bit.

Pros:
Several races to choose from
Several classes to choose from
Actual story for the campaign
You can change sountrack to whatever music you prefer
You can give your units proper order like in no other RTS.

Even if you have some legacy machine running Win XP and the old CD or the PirateBay version of the game i would still recommend buying this one. Idle for cards and support badge collectors. I mean do it for the children. :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198027269099', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 814, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 685, 'last_played': 1643497907}
review:
I'm recommending this game with a warning: it's fan-modded, and it sometimes crashes to the desktop in the middle of your game, which can be maddening.  I've experienced other odd, one-off bugs from time to time, like being declared victorious when the enemy kills my hero instead of other way 'round, and unusual unit behavior occasionally.  But I was such a huge, drooling fanboy of WBII, which sadly is not offered on Steam, that I had to pick up WBIII for 10 bucks.  It's not all that different from WBII and still contains all the elements that made the original great: persistent heroes, different races to lead (with genuine differences in gameplay), towers that you can occupy to make them stronger, and no-fuss resource gathering which again you can strengthen permanently by adding workers (though "permanent" assumes the enemy won't convert your resource).  There is also some really good assignable AI for your units, with an unusually large number of choices, from RAMPANT (stomp around the map attacking everything) to GUARD to FALLBACK 25% HEALTH and PATROL and so many more.  The only time the game really gets fidgety is when the enemy and you keep converting the same set of resources over and over and over, at which point you really have to just break the cycle and start making advanced units to go wipe him out.

TL;DR?
A really good RTS in its day, with some unique features that make it still a blast to play.  This version is fan-modded and sometimes quirky, sometimes buggy.  For $10 it was a no-brainer for me, but modern gamers with no history wth the game may find it quaint and dated.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006070561', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 6245, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2646, 'last_played': 1613312549}
review: Warlords Battlecry III was the best RTS in IMHO, but this is not the game I loved and it is buggy.  First of all, summoning characters, such as my alchemist I saved for the last 5 years, are crippled, becasue summoned beings time out and disappear.  Obviously someone thought this a good idea, all well and good perhaps, but if you are going to make a major change then you have no right calling it Warlord Battlecry III.  It isn't. Second of all, campaign mode does not work at all, as the map cannot be navigated and it has occasionally crashed.  I kind of like playing it, but it is not what I meant to purchase and the seller should be ashamed.

author: {'steamid': '76561197990076480', 'num_games_owned': 193, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 15, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1461739750}
review:
Так то не плохо. Только почему оверлей стима не работает?

P.S. - Лучше б вторую часть (Warlords Battlecry 2) добавили бы, там интереснее играть. В этой только сюжет не понравился. В прошлой части его хоть почти и не было, но было интересно воевать и захватывать земли и замки. Как то помню ностальгия хлынула, скачал - 3 дня прошел всю.
----------------------------------------Это было старое мнение...------------------------------------------------------

Почему я поменял мнение? Так как я играл не стим версию, я начил сравнивать ее. В итоге заметил тучу изменений лишних в этой версии. Ставить патчи, моды и прочую хрень не для меня. Я лучше пойду скачаю пиратку второй части, она в разы лучше, чем даже та же пиратка со старым патчем 3й части. 
Да, это как бы одна из моих любымых игр. Но что то не прет она ... 
Так же там нет поддержки оверлея стим, нет поддержки сетевой игры(она сделана корява и надо в инете смотреть какие порты открывать). Играть можно и при помощи Evolve Gaming platform. А так это все бред. В стим только зря добавили. 

Возврат денег 100%.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009162609', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 555, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 377, 'last_played': 1588362093}
review: It may just be a WIndows 10 issue, but the game is unplayable. Even running as administrator in compatability mode for Windows XP - Windows 7, heroes will not save, normal or ironman. After hours of digging on forums and searching through google, non of the suggested fixes have worked for anyone. The only solution that people agree on is to download the fan made mod version of the game, which crashes all the time.... If you do buy this game, remember to close it when your heroes don't save and you start to search online for a fix. Steam has refused to refund me twice because I have over 2 hours of play time. About 3 of those 3.5 hours were spent searching for a fix.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970681465', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 374, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 261, 'last_played': 1455493074}
review:
I wish the Ironman Mode worked. Other than that though this is a pretty entertaining game; I love the mix of RPG elements blended in with the real-time strategy aspects such as how a character can retain his levels for future missions with all the base-building, teching, and unit micromanagement of the RTS genre. I really would like to play this Multiplayer as my skirmishes against the AI are uneventful although were fun to learn how the game works. I have yet to play the Campaign mode as well but if it adds a story to the already intriguing system of leveling up and building then I'm all for it.

I'd give this game a solid 7/10 due to the fact that the game is a bit unrefined at times with units not following today's standards of pathfinding along with some clunkiness with the AI, and lastly an Ironman Mode feature that apparently has not worked for a while. I'd expect if I had a friend or two to play this with this could easily be bumped up to an 8.

author: {'steamid': '76561198169135462', 'num_games_owned': 425, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 1026, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1662844393}
review: O que dizer sobre este jogo..... Eu jogo ele desde o seu lançamento em 2004, bons tempos. Tempos tão bons que eu até hoje jogo este game, e ontem estava fuçando na Steam quando derrepente me deparo com esta maravilha dos RTS, fiquei surpreso em ver que a Steam o inseriu em sua plataforma. eu ja tive 3 CDs deste game, quantas horas passei jogando este jogo, creio que mais de 1000hrs. até hoje não existe um RTS que pode ser comparado a este. Ele é simplesmente incrível e único, só quem jogou desde o seu inicio vai saber como este jogo é fantástico e o quanto ele vicia. Eu recomendo fortemente, este game deveria ter mais espaço no mercado, mas infelismente não esta mais em seu tempo, mas nunca vou parar de jogá-lo, a Enlight marcou época para os poucos que apreciaram esta obra de arte.

author: {'steamid': '76561198018444568', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 670, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 448, 'last_played': 1624831427}
review:
Some weeks before the actual release of WBCIII on steam i wanted to run WBII on win10. It installed and worked fine till the game crashed. After a lot of useless inet patching i gave the idea to play the game away. Some days after, the release of WBCIII was announced on steam. It was the first game after the whole "remake" eons of Resident Evil etc. pp i really wanted to play after so many years.

The WBC III has a balance patch onboard (summoning patch) that makes the game for some playstyles harder (summoners) and in multi the game more balanced. Im glad it is working fine on the new OS without any issues, one thing i would love to see is a resolution patch (and maybe HD textures). On the other side im satisfied seeing the game not crashing on every attempt tabing out to desktop.

I could only recommend buying the game playing it and have a look how great RTS work was done so many years ago. Must have 10/10
